ownerGroup.id left join lily."user" ownerUser on a.uid = ownerUser.id left join saleodr prev on a.prev = prev.id left join lily."user" op on a.op = op.id left join plan plan on a.plan = plan.id left join salecat category on a.cat = category.id

mapper.insert: insert into saleodr( uid, gid, mode, acl, priority, flags, "state", creation, lastmod, "version", t0, t1, "year", subject, op, text, form, formargs, props, cat, phase, prev, plan, customer_org, customer, "length", sum_qty, sum_amount ) values( #{ownerUserId}, #{ownerGroupId}, #{accessMode}, #{acl}, #{priority}, #{flags}, #{state}, #{creationDate}, #{lastModifiedDate}, #{version}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{year}, #{subject}, #{opId}, #{rawText}, #{formId}, #{formArguments}, #{properties.jsonStr}::jsonb, #{categoryId}, #{phaseId}, #{previousOrderId}, #{planId}, #{customerOrgId}, #{customerId}, #{length}, #{totalQuantity}, #{totalAmount} );
mapper.select: select extract(year from t0)::int "year", count(*) "count" from saleodr group by extract(year from t0)::int
